title: Disconnecting bug.
body: i have had 3 or 4 games in the past two nights that i have constantly disconnected during but haven't had any lag up until the dc. 20ms ping then minions stop taking damage people still seem to move but do not see abilities or aas or deaths. restarting client briefly helps but then just goes back to dc-ing.

replies.body: It seems I have been having the same issue randomly over the past few days.

Are you disconnecting entirely, or are the minion animations repeating constantly?  You might be having packet loss that's causing a disruption in communicating with the game.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your specific issue.  Let me know your results!
